statements: SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria;
SELECT criterion_name, weight FROM grant_evaluation_criteria;
SELECT description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE criterion_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weight > 0.5 ORDER BY criterion_name ASC, weight DESC
SELECT criterion_name, weight FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE criterion_id < 5 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weight < 0.3 AND criterion_name LIKE 'Gr%' ORDER BY criterion_id ASC
SELECT description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE criterion_name IN ('Impact', 'Feasibility')
SELECT criterion_id, criterion_name, weight FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria;
SELECT criterion_name, weightage FROM grant_evaluation_criteria ORDER BY weightage DESC;
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weightage > 3;
SELECT rubric_name, score_range FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE rubric_id = '12345';
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weightage <= 2;
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weightage > 3.5 ORDER BY criterion_name ASC
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE weightage BETWEEN 1.0 AND 5.0
SELECT * FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE rubric_name ILIKE '%impact%'
SELECT rubric_name, score_range FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE criterion_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT criterion_name, weightage FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM evaluation_criteria;
SELECT criterion_name, description FROM evaluation_criteria ORDER BY criterion_name DESC;
SELECT rubric_id, rubric_name, description FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE rubric_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_scores WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT evaluation_id, rubric_id, score FROM evaluation_scores ORDER BY score ASC, evaluation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_criteria;
SELECT criterion_id, criterion_name, description FROM evaluation_criteria ORDER BY criterion_name;
SELECT evaluation_id, rubric_id, score, comments FROM evaluation_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_id DESC;

SELECT scoring_rubrics.rubric_id, scoring_rubrics.rubric_name, scoring_rubrics.score_range, evaluation_scores.score FROM scoring_rubrics INNER JOIN evaluation_scores ON scoring_rubrics.rubric_id = evaluation_scores.rubric_id;

SELECT evaluation_scores.evaluation_id, scoring_rubrics.rubric_name, scoring_rubrics.description, evaluation_scores.comments FROM evaluation_scores JOIN scoring_rubrics ON evaluation_scores.rubric_id = scoring_rubrics.rubric_id WHERE scoring_rubrics.score_range LIKE '%Excellent%';
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria;
SELECT id, category FROM grant_evaluation_criteria ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, criteria_id, score FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_scores WHERE user_id = 100 AND score < 50;
SELECT * FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category, description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT description FROM grant_evaluation_criteria WHERE category = 'Innovation' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM scoring_rubrics WHERE score BETWEEN 0 AND 5;
SELECT criteria_id, AVG(score) FROM evaluation_scores GROUP BY criteria_id HAVING AVG(score) > 3;
SELECT * FROM evaluators;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 1000;
SELECT criteria_name, description FROM grant_criteria WHERE criteria_id = 1;
SELECT rubric_name, criteria_name FROM rubrics JOIN grant_criteria ON rubrics.criteria_id = grant_criteria.criteria_id;
SELECT evaluator_name, department FROM evaluators WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM grant_criteria ORDER BY criteria_id DESC;
SELECT rubric_name, criteria_name FROM rubrics JOIN grant_criteria ON rubrics.criteria_id = grant_criteria.criteria_id WHERE rubric_id = 1;
SELECT evaluator_name, department FROM evaluators WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY evaluator_name ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;

SELECT rubric_name, evaluator_name, score FROM rubrics JOIN evaluation_scores ON rubrics.rubric_id = evaluation_scores.rubric_id JOIN evaluators ON evaluation_scores.evaluator_id = evaluators.evaluator_id WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY rubric_name ASC;
